parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: DedicatedHostGroupId
parameters.description: The dedicated cluster ID. You can call the DescribeDedicatedHostGroups operation to query the dedicated cluster ID.

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description: The database engine of the instance. Valid values: **MySQL** and **PostgreSQL**.

parameters.name: EngineVersion
parameters.description:
The database engine version of the instance. Valid values:

*   Valid values when you set the Engine parameter to MySQL: **8.0**, **5.7**, **5.6**, and **5.5**
*   Valid values when you set the Engine parameter to PostgreSQL: **15.0**, **14.0**, **13.0**, **12.0**, **11.0**, and **10.0**

parameters.name: MinorVersionTag
parameters.description: The minor engine version of the instance. You can specify this parameter to query the minor engine version of the instance.

parameters.name: NodeType
parameters.description:
The instance edition. Valid values:

*   **Basic**: RDS Basic Edition
*   **HighAvailability**: RDS High-availability Edition
*   **Finance**: RDS Enterprise Edition

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description:
The storage type of the instance. Valid values:

*   **local_ssd**: local SSD
*   **cloud_ssd**: standard SSD
*   **cloud_essd**: enhanced SSD (ESSD) of performance level 1 (PL1)
*   **cloud_essd2**: ESSD of PL2
*   **cloud_essd3**: ESSD of PL3
